### western canada ordination plot
```{r}
wcan_ord_biomass <- read.csv("our_data/functional_diversity/wcan_t1.csv")

### simplify data
wcan_ord_biomass <- wcan_ord_biomass %>%
  dplyr::select(nfi_plot,
                NFI_species,
                biomass_composition)
as.numeric(wcan_ord_biomass$nfi_plot)

pca <- rda(wcan_ord_biomass)

# Extract scores for plotting
scores <- scores(pca, display = "sites")

# Plot PCA
plot(scores, type = "n")
text(scores)
```
